resources.string: Mangoo is this first food delivery service which has partnered with your favorite restaurants and hotels in Karaikal. We deliver all kind of foods at your doorsteps. You can render our service to enjoy eating your desired veg and non-veg recipes at the comfort of your home. Simply login to our app by entering your address and selecting the restaurant with items that you would like, weâ€™ll be at your door in about 30-45 minutes. You can follow your order under your account and track it from My Order section.
Although most orders are delivered within an hour, circumstances such as traffic or weather may slightly delay your delivery.

Orders are immediately submitted to the restaurants after being placed. Once the restaurant starts preparing it, The order cannot be cancelled. Please contact us with any issues you may have. Our Minimum Ordering Cost is 100 Rupees.
